short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert GIF Files to JPEG format

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How to convert GIF to JPEG?	 

1-Click extension icon - this will open GIF to JPEG online conversion website. 
2-Select GIF file and click convert button. 
3-You will get your JPEG file download link in your email address.
